snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is warning insurance companies that they will not be able to deny gender reassignment surgery or other treatment if a doctor says it is medically necessary.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo warns insurance companies that they will no longer be allowed to deny gender reassignment surgery or other treatment to change a person's gender if a doctor says it is medically necessary; cites state law requiring insurance companies to cover diagnosis and treatment of psychological disorders, including gender dysphoria.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is warning insurance companies that they will not be able to deny gender reassignment surgery or other treatment if a doctor says it is medically necessary.

headline.main: Insurers in New York Must Cover Gender Reassignment Surgery, Cuomo Says
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Says Insurance Must Cover Sex Changes
